body: Ok, so Mojang won't let me migrate my mc account, and I can't figure out how to start a stream without the account being migrated. Help anyone xD?
body_tagged: Ok, so Mojang won't let me migrate my mc account, and I can't figure out how to start a stream without the account being migrated. Help anyone xD?
title: Twitch Help

replies.body:
Get a streaming software like OBS and just search up some tutorials on youtube

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=How+to+livestream+on+twitch
replies.body_tagged:
Get a streaming software like OBS and just search up some tutorials on youtube

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=How+to+livestream+on+twitch

replies.body: Your best bet is to get OBS (which is free) or action (fully accessible) to be able to stream with.
replies.body_tagged: Your best bet is to get OBS (which is free) or action (fully accessible) to be able to stream with.

replies.body: Yeah I suggest OBS the Twitch function in Minecraft is somewhat broken and when I try to use it it sometimes never even works. But if you would like some help to set it up either way I am available for the next couple of hours so hit me up on Skype,
